feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -20.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 12:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -20.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -26.9°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
